dt-option.name: language.searchBuilder.conditions.string
dt-option.summary: Set the condition names for the string column type

type.description: `-init language.searchBuilder.conditions.string` changes what will be displayed for the SearchBuilder's condition `-tag select` element for string and html conditions.

dt-option.description:
This object sets the text for the condition names in the condition `-tag select` element. The defaults for each language option is listed below.
* `=: 'Equals'` * `!=: 'Not'` * `starts: 'Starts With'` * `!starts: 'Does Not Start With'` * `contains: 'Contains'` * `!contains: 'Does Not Contain'` * `ends: 'Ends With'` * `!ends: 'Does Not End With'` * `null: 'Empty'` * `!null: 'Not Empty'`
